info_content:
You can only see this message and not the embed?
Then read this https://docs.emojiguardian.xyz/troubleshooting
content:
You can only see the dropdown and the buttons?
Then read this https://docs.emojiguardian.xyz/troubleshooting

fields.name: {emoji_bot}About Emoji Guardian
fields.value:
> Emoji Guardian is a bot especially for emoji servers.
> With the Bot, you can do a lot with emojis like locking an emoji to a role and much more.

fields.name: {emoji_tools}How can I see the commands?
fields.value: > Click under the buttons on the select menu and select a command category.

fields.name: {emoji_support}How can I get support?
fields.value: > You can join [support server](https://discord.gg/EbBsuxVNYT) or you can DM `Lost Paul#3453` or `Danu#4422`

fields.name: {emoji_translate}How can I change the language of the bot?
fields.value:
> You can change the language of the bot by using the command `/language set`
> Your language isn't their? Then you can start translating it at https://translate.emojiguardian.xyz/
